players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob, he's mafia. Diana was killed by him. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana, maybe a mistake. I didn't investigate anyone."
You: "I agree with Charlie, Bob is mafia. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana, maybe a mistake. I think Charlie is lying, maybe he's mafia."
Charlie: "Bob knows I'm detective, so he lies. He killed Diana. Vote Bob."
You: "I think Charlie is the detective, Bob is mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

You: "I didn't kill Diana, maybe a mistake. I think Charlie is lying, maybe he's mafia."
Charlie: "Bob knows I'm detective, so he lies. He killed Diana. Vote Bob."
Alice: "I think Charlie is the detective, Bob is mafia. Vote Bob."
